title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Discrete MathematicsGeneral concepts of coding theory, noise and error correcting codes, linear codes including the hamming, golary, Reed Muller codes. Finite and number fields, algebraic function fields, algebraic curves and their applications, cyclic codes (including the BCH, Reed-Solomon, Justesen, Goppa, and quadratic residue codes). Decoding techniques for some these codes. Applications to information processing.
